context.description: An Object that describes the general setting, environment or project leading to the creation or maintenance of this dataset. In science this can be the research project.

title.description: A title of the associated project.
title.title: Context Title

documentation.description: A URL of the project documentation.
documentation.title: Documentation

sourceCode.description: A URL of the source code of the project.
sourceCode.title: Source Code

publisher.description: The publishing agency of the data. This can be the OEP.
publisher.title: Publisher

publisherLogo.description: A URL to the logo of the publishing agency of data.
publisherLogo.title: Publisher Logo

contact.description: A reference to the creator or maintainer of the data set. This can be an email address or a GitHub handle.
contact.title: E-Mail Contact

fundingAgency.description: A name of the entity providing the funding. This can be a government agency or a company.
fundingAgency.title: Funding Agency

fundingAgencyLogo.description: A URL to the logo or image of the funding agency.
fundingAgencyLogo.title: Funding Agency Logo

grantNo.description: An identifying grant number. In case of a publicly funded project, this number is assigned by the funding agency.
grantNo.title: Grant Number

context.title: Context
